title: Lease Today, Washer Dryer In Unit, Spa and Fitness Center

VIEW OUR WEBSITE:
<URL>
Experience the tranquility of spacious, low-density garden-style apartment living in the heart of Redwood Shores!
Our community a modern, vibrant living center with an unparalleled quality of living.
Exercise in our state of the art fitness center located adjacent to our indoor pool.

Enjoy the convenience and reliability of our package lockers for all of your deliveries, as well as the peace of mind that comes with living in a community so close to nature and yet not far from major employers, grocery stores and restaurants.
Pescadero Apartments is a gated community located just minutes away from bayside jogging and biking trails.
All of these features and many more are available to our residents.
Pets are also welcome here!
In order to assure the highest quality of living for our residents, some restrictions apply (breed, weight, etc. call for details!)

In addition to our community amenities, all our residents can enjoy modern in-unit laundry machines as well as upgraded energy-star stainless-steel kitchen appliances including dishwashers and microwaves.
Beautiful stone countertops also adorn the kitchen and bathrooms.
A generous storage space comes standard on your private patio or balcony, as does ample closet space within the home itself.
Seize the opportunity to reserve your dream apartment today with only a $500 deposit, which is fully refundable within three days.
Be sure to ask about our latest move-in specials!
Our friendly and knowledgeable management staff will guide you through the simple application process and ensure that your move-in is free of uncertainties.
Call us today to schedule a tour of your new home!
Please also visit our website at <URL>/
We hope to see you soon!
This two bedroom two bathroom apartment features a fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, washer/dryer, fireplace, walk-in closets, and a private patio/balcony with storage!
This apartment requires a $600 deposit.
